data.rationale:
I created a module which allows less-code DBI interactions, one
    method handles connect, prepare and execute, it returns an array for
    SELECT statements and reuses already existing connections. It
    automatically reuses already established connections.

    It is an extension to DBI, and is intended to make DBI simpler to
    use, so DBIx::Ease could describe it well.
